flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.summary: An IR pen (with a Wii remote and some software) can give you a computer mouse, on a wall, a table top, a floor or just about anywhere. The possibilities for art, music, teaching, training, or party games are mindblowing!!
guide.title: Write With Light! (Make one of the world's longest IR pens)
